question: At my wedding night i gifted Rs. 20000/ to my wife and she asked me to keep it. Do I have to return her that Rs. 20000
answer:
QUESTION

At my wedding night i gifted Rs. 20000/ to my wife and she asked me to keep it. After few years we broke up and i gave her divorce. Now please tell me

Do I have to return her that Rs. 20000. Please note that this is not a haq mehr money.?

ANSWER


Share:

You have to return the money to your ex-wife. You gave it to her as a gift and kept it by you as a trust.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
